embed.title: Welcome to the CompSoc server!
embed.content:
CompSoc is the University of Edinburgh's society for anyone interested in tech.
════════

field.title: CHANNELS
field.content:
We have channels for general and academic chatting, each CompSoc SIG, and more! Browse the list on <id:browse> and customise your channel list!
━━

field.title: THERE ARE BOT USERS!
field.content:
CompSoc bridges communication to IRC and individual SIG Discords where possible, to allow you to chat across technical borders. People on different servers show up as bots on Discord!
━━

field.title: WANT TO HELP SHAPE COMPSOC?
field.content:
If you are a first year, you can apply to become a **first-year representative** in autumn of your first year! This is a common and easy way to familiarise yourself with internals of the CompSoc org! For all other positions (including President, Secretary, Treasurer), elections for the subsequent academic year take place at the **Annual General Meeting** in April! You can nominate yourself!
━━

field.title: INVITES
field.content: If you want to invite your friends to this server, send them this: https://comp-soc.com/chat If you know they prefer Discord you can use this invite link: https://discord.com/invite/e4y8Vy5
